title: Electronic Arts Origin URI Handler Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Electronic Arts Origin. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious web page.
There is an issue with the way the product handles URIs within certain schemes. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute a system call. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user at medium integrity.
timeline:
2019-05-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2019-06-17 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2019-09-10 - Advisory Updated
credit: Ron Waisberg of Trend Micro Security Research
